name: Discover My Passport
description: Discover My Passport is a point and click type escape game developed by BestEscapeGames. Dick and Ed are very close friends. Dick is working in a corporate company and he has applied for passport for his career growth. Once he got the passport his friend Ed asked the passport to just see it. Unfortunately, Ed kept the passport in his house and he went to foreign for some work. Suddenly Dick has got an offer to move to foreign for his work. He needs the passport to proceed, but it got locked in Ed house. Help dick to find out the objects and solve the puzzles to Discover his Passport soon. Keep playing and Have fun. Good luck.
